text: Joe Shirley Jr. (born December 4, 1947) is a Navajo politician. He is the only two-term President of the Navajo Nation. He was president from 2003 to 2011. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Navajo Nation Category:Politicians from Arizona Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Joe Shirley Jr.
